## Read Raw Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: df_raw

df_raw <- read_csv(here('data/raw/raw_example.csv'))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```

── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
# examine raw data
summary(df_raw)
```

:::
:::


## Preprocess Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: df_clean

df_clean <-
  df_raw |>
  ## vs and and am are dichotomous -> change to logical values
  mutate(
    vs = as.logical(vs),
    am = as.logical(am)
  )

# examine cleaned data
summary(df_clean)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     car                 mpg             cyl             disp      
 Length:32          Min.   :10.40   Min.   :4.000   Min.   : 71.1
```

:::


## Save Processed Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: save_df
#| eval: false

write_csv(df_clean, here('data/processed/example.csv'))
```
:::
